Setup environment and nbdev

First time only:

  • Tested with Ubuntu (wsl)
    conda create -n prodb python=3.9 jupyter pip conda activate prodb git clone https://github.com/lukexyz/prodb.git pip install -r requirements.txt
  • Install githooks from project folder
    nbdev_install_git_hooks

Frequently during develoment:

1. 🏗️ Build lib from notebooks

nbdev_build_lib

2. 📝 Build docs from notebooks

nbdev_build_docs

Install

pip install prodb

How to use

Don't forget code examples:
